workflow.name: Extract Data from Invoices with OCR, Gemini AI, and Airtable
workflow.description:
*This workflow contains community nodes that are only compatible with the self-hosted version of n8n.*

## üìñ Extract Data from Invoices with OCR, Gemini AI, and Airtable

This template automates the process of extracting key details from invoices (PDF, JPG, PNG) and storing them in Airtable using **OCR + AI**. It eliminates manual data entry by leveraging **Tesseract OCR**, **Google Gemini AI**, and **Airtable**, with optional **Telegram notifications**. The workflow is ideal for freelancers, small businesses, and finance teams who need a lightweight and automated solution for handling invoice data.

### üîë Features
- ‚úÖ Supports **JPG, PNG, and PDF** invoices  
- üß† Automatically extracts: *Invoice Number, Invoice Date (standardized to YYYY-MM-DD), Subtotal, Tax, Total, Currency, Vendor Name, Email, Phone, and Ship-to Address*  
- üì§ Sends structured data into Airtable automatically  
- üì¨ Sends a **Telegram notification** once data is processed (optional)  
- üîÅ Triggers automatically when new files are dropped into a folder  

### ‚ö†Ô∏è Disclaimer
This workflow uses **community nodes** (`n8n-nodes-tesseractjs`, `n8n-nodes-pdf-page-extract`).  
It works best on **self-hosted n8n** or n8n cloud instances where these nodes are available.  
You must install and configure these nodes before importing the workflow.

### ‚öôÔ∏è Setup & Configuration
1. Install Docker with n8n.  
2. Mount your folder (e.g., `~/self-hosted-ai/ocr-bot:/shared`) so invoices can be dropped into `/shared/ocr/`.  
3. Import the provided JSON workflow into n8n.  
4. Replace credentials:  
   - **Google Gemini API key**  
   - **Airtable base + token**  
   - **Telegram bot token** (optional)  
5. Drop a sample invoice (PDF/JPG/PNG) into the configured folder.  
6. Check Airtable for structured data and Telegram (if enabled) for confirmation.  

### üß† Customization
- Modify the **AI prompt** to extract additional fields.  
- Replace Airtable with **Google Sheets** or another database if preferred.  
- Update the Telegram node with your own **Chat ID** for notifications.  

---

üí° *Tip: Add a screenshot of the workflow in n8n to help users quickly understand the node structure.*

parameters.fieldsToExclude: confidence, filename, totalPages, pages, metadata, info

parameters.content: ### Ensure you are pointing the folder location in the trigger to the folder you have mounted in n8n.

## Features
- ‚úÖ Supports JPG, PNG, and PDF invoices
- üß† Extracts: Invoice number, date, total, tax, subtotal, currency, vendor name, email, phone, ship-to address
- üì§ Sends data to Airtable automatically
- üì¨ Telegram message on completion (optional)
- üîÅ Runs automatically when files are dropped into a folder
### Please ensure to update your Chat ID so that the bot can send the message your DM.
### If you would not like to use Airtable, you can use Google sheets as an alternative.
## If you need any help in setting up with the workflow, please feel free to contact me @ vinaysingh.b@outlook.in

options.systemMessage:
=<TASK>
Process received "{{ $json.data[0].text }}" and update individual fields in the Airtable tool, like for example

Invoice Number,
Invoice date if available (if available), Always convert the date into format : '2025-06-21',
Invoice SubTotal amount (if available),
Invoice tax (if available),
Invoice Total,
Currency,
Vendor Name,
Email address of the vendor,
Phone number(ignore if FAX number is available),
Ship to address
</TASK>

<Telegram_Response>
Please reply in the below format:

Invoice details has been updated successfully.
Invoice: <>
Invoice date: <>
Invoice SubTotal: <>
Invoice tax: <>
Invoice Total: <>
Currency: <>
Vendor: <>
Email address: <>
Phone number: <>
Ship to address: <>
</Telegram_Response>

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
